content.question: A car traveling in a straight line slows down at a constant rate and comes to a stop as it travels a distance <math alttext="delta x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>Δ</mtext><mi>x</mi></math> in time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math>. What was the car’s initial velocity?

choices.label: <math alttext="2 times the fraction delta x, over t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mfrac><mrow><mtext>Δ</mtext><mi>x</mi></mrow><mi>t</mi></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="the fraction delta x, over t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mtext>Δ</mtext><mi>x</mi></mrow><mi>t</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="two thirds, times the fraction delta x, over t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mtext>Δ</mtext><mi>x</mi></mrow><mi>t</mi></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="one half, times the fraction delta x, over t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mtext>Δ</mtext><mi>x</mi></mrow><mi>t</mi></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="2 times the fraction delta x, over t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mfrac><mrow><mtext>Δ</mtext><mi>x</mi></mrow><mi>t</mi></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
